text: this is Bill Cunningham reporting from
Paris and as always no matter what
anyone says the Paris remains the
creative center of fashion both on the
runways and on the thousands of guests
attending and for today's page
I chose member name of Rick goin that
came from California but he has been
designing and showing in Paris for 15
years and he has a reputation as a
designer of many black or gray clothes
for followers of the Gothic style which
to a lot of people is creepy and
off-the-wall but Wow
is it imaginative and this year on his
runway he took a shop turned to the most
diaphanous gauzy spring summer clothes
they were almost like the transparency
of dragonfly wings really absolutely
beautiful and all you might even think
like clouds floating around the body
they didn't fit and of course naturally
they wouldn't appeal to everyone but
what beautiful dresses for evening and
what makes him interesting to me are the
guests at his show so many of them dress
in wear clothes in a Rico and style and
in particular the women are almost out
shown by the men in the black clothes
and the the footwear which is black and
white soles that at times looks like the
wearer is standing on mushrooms it
everywhere you look the hairstyle
everything into a lot of people they
would disobey thought of as eccentric
well it may very well be but how
beautiful
put together I mean it's amazing and the
scope of his show and the reaction of
his audience it caught a flavor that no
one else had
Oh
